Articles.Content:
I have a hard time seeing some of the vector stuff on the navball, and was wondering if there were some way of making it at least 2x larger without changing the screen resolution.

Edited April 7, 2014 by Kazun
answered
If you pop open the settings.cfg with your favorite word editor and find "UI_Size = " and double that value it should be bigger.
There is also a setting in the main menu settings page called In Flight UI. You can use the slider to set it to max.
